albums.title: Dave Matthews Band
albums.info: Come Tomorrow debuted at number one on the US Billboard 200 with 292,000 album-equivalent units, making it the biggest sales week for a rock album in over four years, and the biggest sales week for an album in 2018, with 285,000 copies sold.

albums.title: Anjunabeats
albums.info: Anjunabeats is an established global touring brand, presenting cutting edge trance and progressive lineups at iconic venues and festivals including EDC Las Vegas and Tomorrowland. Their latest alumb is by Grum and is titled Deep State.

albums.title: Gramatik
albums.info: Epigram - The latest album released by Gramatik. Released on December 14, 2016.
